DOC.brief_summary: Purpose study investigate whether intraoperative image use 1.5T MRI craniopharyngioma surgery useful order increase rate complete tumor removal .
DOC.criteria: complex craniopharyngioma > 1cm extension within 2 cranial fossa ventricular system Patient legal representative able provide write informed consent tumor size < 1 cm Patients condition consider contraindication MRI Patients condition consider contraindication surgery Hypothalamic disturbance Hypothalamic edema
